title: The Prospector

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose a player to Blast.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- RB/CTRL Immune
- When you Blast the same player multiple times, the effect changes:
- The first time you Blast a house, roleblock the player there as you disrupt their sleep.
- The second time you Blast a house, roleblock them and all their visitors.
- The third time you Blast a house, demolish it, dealing an Unstoppable attack to them and all their visitors. You can't Blast their house anymore if they're still alive somehow.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5375
*The smell of blasting powder dominates the air. She wants nothing more than to watch the titans fall.*
